mapper.insert: INSERT INTO invoice_expense_type_rules ( TENANT_ID, SET_OF_BOOKS_ID, ID, GOODS_NAME, EXPENSE_TYPE_ID, ENABLED, START_DATE, END_DATE, DESCRIPTION, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, VERSION_NUMBER ) SELECT #{TenantId}, t.SET_OF_BOOKS_ID, t.id, t.GOODS_NAME, (select p.id from exp_expense_type p where p.code = t.EXPENSE_TYPE_CODE), t.enabled, t.START_DATE, t.END_DATE, t.DESCRIPTION, #{currentDate}, #{userId}, #{currentDate}, #{userId}, 1 FROM inv_exp_type_rules_temp t WHERE t.batch_number = #{transactionID} AND t.error_flag = 0
mapper.select: select (select count(0) as successEntities from inv_exp_type_rules_temp where batch_number = #{transactionID} and error_flag = 0) as successEntities, (select count(0) as failureEntities from inv_exp_type_rules_temp where batch_number = #{transactionID} and error_flag = 1) as failureEntities, #{transactionID } as transaction_id from dual

select t.row_number AS rowNumber, t.error_msg AS error FROM inv_exp_type_rules_temp t
WHERE t.batch_number = #{transactionID} and t.error_flag = 1
